sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The following sections give you a short introduction into OpenSCADA.

sect2.title: Overview and Purpose
sect2.para: This document describes the different components of OpenSCADA from a users point of view.

sect2.title: Quick Start
sect2.para: This section is intended to give you a really quick start in some of the OpenSCADA functionality.

sect3.title: Test Client
sect3.para: There is a test client called OSTC. Its purpose is to aid testing and performing generic tasks. It is not a end user client.

See section on how to install OSTC. Once you have it up and running perform the following steps:
Start the application
Switch to the DA perspective
Right click on the Standard entry in the Navigator
Add two new URIs: da:net://localhost:1202 and da:net://localhost:1203
Start the two simulation servers from the Testing menu
Right click on the previously created URI entries and issue the Connect command
You can now browse through the items provided by the connected DA server.
